europeana:record.dc:title: Optimization of character coding and a stepwise execution of cladistic analyses
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Vaupel Klein, von J.C.
europeana:record.dc:subject: a/p coding
absence/presence coding
binarization
character coding
character linkage
cladistic
europeana:record.dc:description: The absence/presence routine of character coding is examined in regard to minimizing its inherent redundancy effects with the purpose of optimizing the structuring of a comprehensive, binary datamatrix. Cladistic analytical procedures are next evaluated with respect to the successive use of such a datamatrix at different hierarchical levels. It is concluded that performing a stepwise analysis has various advantages over the more oft en employed techniques, i.e., the ‘total analysis’ routines and the ‘partitioned’ approaches.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Optimization of character coding and a stepwise execution of cladistic analyses (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 83) (Issue 20)
